techmeme.title: Recording: Intel's new CEO Lip-Bu Tan told staff that Intel is no longer "in the top 10 semiconductor companies" and it is "too late" to catch up to Nvidia (Mike Rogoway/Oregonian)
Sources: Meta won't propose additional changes to its pay-or-consent model in the EU, and could face fresh antitrust charges and hefty daily fines (Foo Yun Chee/Reuters)
Goldman Sachs CTO Marco Argenti says the bank is "going to start augmenting our workforce with Devin", Cognition's AI coding assistant, as Wall Street adopts AI (Hugh Son/CNBC)
Sources on key Microsoft-OpenAI clause: OpenAI decides when AGI and "sufficient AGI", capable of $100B+ in profits, are reached, and Microsoft can't build AGI (Steven Levy/Wired)
Airalo, which offers affordable eSIM roaming packages for travelers, raised $220M at a $1B+ valuation (Kelsey Warner/Semafor)
